channel.title: 718 Linux VPS Problem!
channel.description: For some reason, when i switched from Windows VPS to Linux, My owner commands got shot. None work at ALL. Not even regular commands for me. They work for everyone else. I try to type ;;home but doesnt work. Never had this problem on windows. Someone please help PLEASE. Urgent matter :(

item.title: 718 Linux VPS Problem!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

So I guess you need to add a load of print statements to see what code gets executed. I have a feeling processCommand isn’t even getting invoked so that’d be the first thing I’d check.

Read full topic

item.title: 718 Linux VPS Problem!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Java is a platform independent language. Unless you’re relying on Windows binaries for your command handling then you have a different problem.
